questions.question: All FME Server Apps require a user to log in before submitting a job.
When can FME Server Apps be used to share a workspace with the public?
options: They can always be shared with the public.
If the FME Server App does not require authentication.
If the FME Server App does not require authentication and the FME Server is publicly accessible.
If the FME Server App does not require authentication, the FME Server is publicly accessible, and public sharing is enabled on the app.

questions.question: What is the main purpose of a Webhook URL?
options: To allow another application to run a workspace programmatically
To send a workspace to a user and allow them to configure parameters without logging into FME Server
Webhook URLs provide a way for users with login credentials to FME Server to run workspaces easily
Webhooks URLs can be used to run a workspace without using engine time
